Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
To get the latest release, go to

  • https://github.com/alkacon/opencms-core/releases

Â and choose the release you want to manipulate. Then:

  • Download the source code
  • Extract the source code archive to the Eclipse workspace
  • Open Eclipse and add a new Java project where you use the name of the downloaded release as the project name
  • Right-click on the project and select "Configure" -> "Convert to Gradle"
  • Refresh Gradle dependencies (dependency errors may remain, but are unproblematic)
